Text.Page:
As long as you're here, the {@Creature:45#3004#athakela stalkers} and {@Creature:45#3003#kelba rippers} are getting too close for comfort.

I'd appreciate you discouraging them from coming any closer. And, if you're heading south from here, drop in on Pokara at {@Rgn:45009$$Camp Insanity}.
Setahl sent you? What a good friend he is. And a good scientist as well. Thanks.
